name: COLD FIRE
description:
prototype for a small, third-person, horrorish walking sim. you wake up in the remains of a strange landscape with no company except your dog. explore what's left of the world. created in 1.5 weeks for code coven IGM with unreal engine 2022  🔮

key features:
  • a short, atmospheric horror experience 
  • ambient soundtrack
  • moody world
controls:
  • WASD to move
  • mouse to look around
  • spacebar to jump
credits:
  • sound by bulbastre
  • all character and environment assets from epic marketplace including:
    • advanced packs
    • toikeee
    • uneasy game dev
    • artyomapanasenko
    • radik bilalov
forthcoming changes:
  • fixing widgets that get stuck on-screen
  • adding collision barriers to all platforms
  • adding sound effects for collecting food and feeding dog
  • creating smoother exit screens
notes:

please note that the executable file appears as 'sad_dog.exe'. it's the correct file for the game.
